sen.j: 藤本は紀伊国新宮へ突破して四国九州へ逃れ再挙することを策すが叶わなかった。
sen.e: FUJIMOTO escaped to Shikoku and Kyushu by breaking through the enemy to Shingu, Kii Province, and planned to give another try, but couldn't.

sen.e: Finally, samurai from Totsugawa area in Nara defected from Tenchu-gumi, and Tenchu-gumi lost the substantial fighting capability.

sen.e: FUJIMOTO succeeded in breaking through the enemy, but disdained to escape, so that, on the following day, he returned to the opponent together with his disciple Yonekichi FUKUURA and made a savage attack on the headquarters of Kishu Domain.

sen.j: 彼が忠兵衛宛に書いた手紙は小判や掛け軸の彩色した絵を書いて「ほしい、ほしい、ほしい、ほしい」と援助の依頼を楽しく書いていて、ユーモアにあふれていて彼の人柄を思わせる。
sen.e: The letter FUJIMOTO wrote to Chubei were full of a sense of humor, in which he asked for support in a cheery note "give us, give us, give us" with colored pictures of koban (former Japanese oval gold coin) and Kakejiku (hanging scroll), and it told a lot about his character.
